A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's Star Wars\, but not by much. Better to rename this Star Chase\, Star Theories\, or Star Debates.  The most heroic moments of this film are ruined by ill timed humor and contradictory philosophy. The fatalism of the Force has reached a whole new level.  The films central story is punctuated by a 20 minute vignette that carries absolutely no weight to the franchise or even the film itself.
